DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate single-dose effectiveness two bronchodilator inhaler give two dose level pediatric asthma patient .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Bronchodilator Inhalers Pediatric Asthmatics
DOC.criteria: Persistent asthma minimum six month duration stable least four week Predicted FEV1 6090 % Demonstration 12 % airway reversibility Continuous requirement betablockers , monoamine oxidase ( MAO ) inhibitor , tricyclic antidepressant , anticholinergic and/or steroid inhale ; Presence clinicallysignificant nonasthmatic acute chronic disease
